storyInfo: A clothing shop Utage frequents is losing their own sense of style, so she decides to secretly do the owner a 'big favor.'

attributes.content: You know me, Utage.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Every week, I shop at Sunset Boulevard, have afternoon tea at the Seven Points Hotel, find places to take some nice photos, and always, always have Higashinese cuisine for Saturday dinners.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: But now? I had to borrow money to buy the latest Mango terminal, and I'm paying in installments too.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I'm broke, my dear. My wallet is as empty as my eyes.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: So that's why you started selling this stuff at 'Origin Strife'? So what are those on the shelf?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Minimalist shoulder bags. The style is trending, so they're all sold out on Sunset Boulevard.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Didn't you used to call them 'pillow cases with shoulder straps'... Oh, and what are those? Slides?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Printed slides, to be precise. They're all the rage with people your age, didn't you know?
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: By the way, I designed those prints by combining the most popular patterns from the past five years. I have three designs to choose from, and I'm sure they'll be popular enough.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: What happened to your older works? Like the 'Sexy Jail' and 'Dark Queen' stuff?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You used to love that 'Wild Jungle' series so much, but I only see a few hats from it... The burdenbeast pendants are gone too.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I... took the rest down.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Can I still buy them from you in the future?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I have to bid farewell to the past, my dear. Perhaps I could gift you a piece the next time you're here, but...
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I'll be real with you: I really, really appreciate you always supporting my designs and hanging out with me. I cherish all my children too.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: But they just don't sell. Ever since you left Lungmen, I have only a few regulars who drop by occasionally, and even fewer new customers.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: More importantly, my dad stopped giving me money.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: He recently married a Lupo woman and told me he can't afford to support me financially anymore. I have to rely on myself now, or I'll be out on the streets.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I... can't live the way I used to anymore, mooching off my dad and roping you in to work on my so-called art.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: So.... have you made any money yet?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Currently... no.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Give it time! Believe me, I just need some time.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: The high-end market may still be dominated by older brands like MARTHE and 0011, but you can find the trendsetters of today just about anywhere now.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: 'Minimalist,' 'Functional,' 'Neo-Retro,' 'Streetwear'... To seize a trend is to seize the future!
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Just look at the stuff I have here. What customers want is 'real fashion' like this, not some artsy nonsense.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: The overall sales volume speaks for itself, and combined with my talent... I'm sure someone will eventually discover the much better designs they can only get here.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Also... I applied for the Spring Pop Fashion Show under the Emerging Designers category, so I've been busy prepping for that too.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: There won't be any big names there. It's mostly a showcase of trendy designs, so it'll be a pretty good chance for me to get some exposure.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Didn't you used to hate those big fashion shows?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You used to say they were... 'for egotistical bigshots, and full of incompetent designers trying every trick in the book to grab attention.'
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Well, I thought it over again recently, and they're not that bad.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I was young then, and not desperate enough for cash...
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Give it to me straight, Zizhen... do you really think your designs are inferior to those sold elsewhere?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: At least their stuff sells.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Ah. Some nuisance is knocking on my door again.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Let's talk later, Zizhen. And gimme all those hats.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Same 20% discount as usual?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I'm sorry, my dear, but I can't do discounts anymore.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Anyway, maybe making a change isn't such a bad idea, Zizhen.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Alright, best of luck with your show.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: A fashion show, hm? Haven't been to something like that in a real long time.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hm... could be fun, once in a while.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: A day before the Spring Pop Fashion Show
(Hmm... if my info was right, it should be here.)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Have a pleasant trip, ladies.
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Did you hear? Mr. Blanche would never have attended a show with so many amateurs if he weren't stuck in a design rut and looking for inspiration.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Lady

attributes.content: I'd expect no less from a famous designer. Even the way he speaks and acts is extraordinary.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Lady

attributes.content: Ha, is he still on your mind? Tomorrow night is for socializing, so you can just have a few drinks with him then.
attributes.name: Stunningly Dressed Lady

attributes.content: What nonsense are you on about?!
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Lady

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Excuse me, Miss. May I see your invitation?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Invitation? Oh, I'm so sorry, but I was in a hurry and forgot to bring it with me.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Apologies, but the pre-show cocktail party is invitation-only, so I can't let you enter without one.
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Oh, this is how you're going to play it... Do you even know who I am?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: A... fashionable looking student?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Surely you've heard of Mr. Blanche?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Blanche? That famous Leithanian designer?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Yeah. He's here at the party tonight, isn't he? I'll let you in on a secret, he's the organizer's special guest.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I did see him earlier...
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: *sigh* Let me just say, famous artists like him are pretty eccentric, and just love ordering people around.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I'm his assistant while he's in Lungmen. I was just with him, but he forgot an extremely important design draft at his studio.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: So I went back to bring it over, but accidentally left my invitation behind.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Is that so? But I don't remember seeing you before... Can you show me any proof?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Well, you can come with me to look for Mr. Blanche.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: But if we disturb him in the middle of an enjoyable conversation... Well, I don't even know what will happen.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Also, you said you don't remember seeing me, but do you remember the two ladies who just left?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Of course. One of them was wearing a red jacket, and the other a dark purple cheongsam.
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: You clearly forgot then. One of them was obviously wearing a bright purple cardigan from MARTHE's autumn collection, and the other a custom red cheongsam from EPOQUE.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You're kidding?! My memory has always been pretty good!
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Do you remember what color Mr. Blanche's suit is then?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Of course! It should be... a dark gray suit?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Yes, no... wait, let me think... Was it black? No, that's not it...
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: See? So no surprise you don't remember me... Ah, I've been dallying here for so long, I hope Mr. Blanche doesn't get mad.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Wait... Argh, why does the guy on the next shift just happen to be on break right now?!
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Tell you what, you go in first and deliver your thing to Mr. Blanche, then I'll come in ASAP to verify everything. Don't forget.
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Hehe, much appreciated.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Well, that was easy.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Alright, the next step is...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Oh, over there.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hello there. Sorry to disturb you, Mr. Blanche.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: I'm a university student from Higashi studying in Yan, majoring in art history and working part-time as a reporter for the school newspaper.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: So, we're currently doing a segment where we interview and record the daily lives of well-known contemporary artists at work.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: People see you as one of the greats of the fashion industry. You're a figure young artists admire and follow, as well as personal hero to me since forever.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Seeing how it's so rare for you to visit Lungmen, I thought I couldn't let this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity slip.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: So, if you could just grant me an interview during the show...?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: An interview? I don't have time in my schedule for that sort of thing.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: I won't disrupt your schedule at all, I just need to follow you around and record some footage during the show.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Listen, child. There's a reason I've taken the time to come all the way to Lungmen and participate in a foreign fashion show held by a group whose names I don't even know—
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: It's because I crave true beauty... I have no time to play house with some student reporter while on my sacred quest.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: Wait... how did you even get in here?
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: About that. I had a chat with my uncle about this event, and he gave me an invite I used to get in.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And if my article is good enough, he said he'd orchestrate a special fashion show back home, and invite famous designers from all over Terra. I'd be able to publish another article too.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You're aware that our clothing back home is pretty unique, right?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Of course I am! Higashi, was it...? Higashi...
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: Well, if it's just an interview... Let me see. If you promise not to interfere with my schedule, I do technically have a bit of time to spare.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: R-Really? Thank you so, so much—so when exactly tomorrow...?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I'll have my assistant send you my address later. I'll arrive here tomorrow at nine-o-clock sharp, and you will attend the show with me.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: But keep in mind that I loathe tardiness.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: Have any of you seen a guest that looks like a university student?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Hey, Mr. Security. Over here.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Were you... talking with Mr. Blanche just now? You're really his assistant?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: How could I possibly lie to you?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: ...Sorry for doubting you earlier.
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: No biggie. Fortunately, you let me in, and Mr. Blanche is quite satisfied.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Right, and I... want to ask you about a private matter.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Oh, it's Mr. Blanche. He's planning to stay in Lungmen for a few more days, but didn't bring a bodyguard with him this time, so he's looking for a trustworthy local.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: He left me to sort it out, and the pay's pretty generous.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: So I was thinking... You guys were probably hired by the show organizers for the event's duration, right?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: And you've been so professional about it too. Any chance you do personal commissions too?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I... Do you really think I'm capable?
attributes.name: Party Security Detail

attributes.content: Well, I still need to ask you some basic interview questions first. Just for form's sake, you know how it is... For example...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Right, can you tell me about the security arrangements for the show?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Sorry, but we're about to close for the day.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Oh, that's alright, I'm just looking.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Please come again!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: She walks down the stairs until her feet are both firmly on the ground. Her thoughts suddenly shift, and she turns around.
The staff member is busy removing the last few items embodying the shop's history from the establishment Utage is all-too familiar with.
She knows that when she's done, it will take on a brand-new, bright and beautiful look.
Just like the neon-lit fashion shops on Sunset Boulevard.
The old signboard, which has remained unchanged for a long time, flickers twice before finally going out.
Phew...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hah—barkeep, pour me another one!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: That's your third one already, young lady.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: Work's been so stressful, how else am I supposed to relax?
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: The more you drink, the more you forget all the little annoyances.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Didn't you change jobs a while back? You said the new place was a pretty decent designer brand shop. What was the name again...?
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: 'Origin Strife.'
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Yeah, wasn't it featured in some fashion magazine too? Recommended by the famous art critic 'Pink Katana,' even.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: It used to be a tiny hole-in-the-wall, but suddenly exploded in popularity. My wife's been pestering me to go shopping there these last few days, but I feel like they sell the same clothes as everywhere else.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: *sigh* Enough about that—
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Evening.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Er, aren't you... the customer from earlier?
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Thanks for taking care of the store while Zizhen's been busy with the fashion show.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Are you a friend of hers?
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Well, I guess you could say that.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: *sigh*... Running the store is the easy part; I can deal with customers just fine. The hard part is... managing the stock.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: There have been more customers these days, and there's no space for all the new goods in the old warehouse.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: So Miss Zizhen took a loan to rent a new warehouse and wants everything moved over.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Isn't the old one filled with all her pet projects? Must be a pain to move them.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Yeah, she left it so messy when she was handling it. It's a pain to sort out because she just stacked everything into a big pile.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: I mean... I even found a bed and some toiletries in there!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I spent a few nights crashing there.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: When I ran into some trouble and didn't want anyone finding out, I borrowed her place for a few days... It's ancient history now, don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: It took me a few days of hard work just to move the new products out. Now all that's left is her old stuff.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: I took a look at them... They're pretty good. More stylish than the current stuff. I don't get why she decided to change her style... *hic*
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Enough thinking. *hic* I just need to put in some elbow grease.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: You seem kinda drunk, maybe you should call it a night.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: W-Who said I was drunk?! I have pretty good alcohol tolerance, I'll have you know! Just watch me! Barkeep, pour me another!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Oh, sorry for underestimating you. Guess I'll have to keep you company then.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Unfortunately I'm allergic to alcohol, so I'll stick to orange juice.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Who cares! Just drink!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: (Tsk, tsk. She's definitely smashed if she bought that excuse.)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: To your new life, and to 'Origin Strife'!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: To 'Origin Strife'!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Ahh—this is great. Only... I'm feeling a bit dizzy...
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Hehe, I'll let you in on a little secret. Zizhen can be pretty careless.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: She used to keep the key on top of the door panel at the old warehouse, or else she'd lose it. Take care of her for me, alright?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Haha, you know it! But she's changed things up, and now it's under the rock right by the door!
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: But don't worry, just leave it to me.
attributes.name: Shop Staff

attributes.content: Thanks, I knew I could count on you.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Alright, that should take care of all the prep work, more or less.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Ah, now I'm excited for tomorrow's show.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: She feels beads of sweat condensing on her palm, and curls her fingers as she puts her hand in her pocket.
She feels the cold metal as she removes it from her jacket.
A 'Wild Jungle' series burdenbeast pendant lies quietly in the palm of her hand.
Now this, this is cute.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Day of the Spring Pop Fashion Show
No, no, you're too kind. I'm not talented at all, I've just been fortunate enough to be taught by some amazing people.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I didn't plan any sort of surprise, really. I have so much more to learn from you all.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Sorry, please excuse me for a moment. I need to check on the show plan again.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: (Things are going so smoothly thanks to that guy.)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: (The clothes were a bit annoying, but at least it's over and done with. Next up, accessories... they should be keeping them around here, right?)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: (Target spotted! Huh? Along with two security guards...)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Did you hear something from above just now?
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard A

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard B

attributes.content: Was I just hearing things? It can't be—Ah! Why'd you just hit my head?!
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard A

attributes.content: What? Why would I do that? The models are about to change their outfits, so hurry up and move this stuff!
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard B

attributes.content: Don't play dumb with me! What's that in your hand?
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard A

attributes.content: My hand—? Huh? Where'd this hammer come from?
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard B

attributes.content: Man, you really...
attributes.name: Warehouse Guard A

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Ah!
attributes.name: Event Security Detail

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: How... what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Event Security Detail

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. You must be here with Mr. Blanche to check things over before the show begins.
attributes.name: Event Security Detail

attributes.content: ...Does he really think I'm suited for the job?
attributes.name: Event Security Detail

attributes.content: Sheesh, stop worrying so much! I got it all settled. Just do your best!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Sure, I'll give it a try.
attributes.name: Event Security Detail

attributes.content: Utage? What brings you here?
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Evening, Zizhen.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Oh, I know. You came to get the latest scoop?
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: ...It's complicated. Anyway, gotta go.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Utage.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Need something?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Don't blame me. I know you're a big fan of my old work, and I'll definitely make it up to you later.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: But you have to understand why I'm doing this. This is what it means to be a designer.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: You like playful and pretty things, and your taste is impeccable. But you're still just a student.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: You don't understand the true value of what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Heh. Maybe it's you who doesn't understand.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Fashion isn't always about coming up with the most appealing design. You don't get labeled 'fashionable' just because a ton of people like it.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But seeing how you think your work needs outside approval to become 'real' fashion, we'll just have to give everyone a good look.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Excuse me, but the show is about to begin and we need to clear the backstage, so if you two ladies could return to your seats...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Okay, I won't spoil your fun anymore. Please enjoy your... unique fashion show.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Miss Ye, I believe you're up first in the Emerging Designers category?
attributes.name: Female Designer

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Hahaha. Today's going to be so eye-opening for those old-timers, right from the start.
attributes.name: Female Designer

attributes.content: (Swirling wineglass)
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Utage...
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Miss Ye? Miss Ye Zizhen!
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I'm over here.... What's the matter?
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I need to confirm something with you.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Calm down. What is it?
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: When I was backstage, I noticed that your showcase items didn't match the list you submitted beforehand. Someone claiming to be your assistant said you decided on a last minute change for a better reception.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: How is that possible?! I told the head stylist about the draping issue with the top pieces earlier... How would he not notice?
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: The head stylist and I saw you talking to the person in question backstage earlier, so... it didn't seem too suspicious.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Could it be... Utage?!
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: The head stylist thought anyone already inside the event couldn't possibly be suspicious, and that every designer would be at the reception, so it was perfectly natural to send an assistant to carry out your changes...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: But I was still a little uneasy, so I came over to confirm...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Stop the show! Stop it now! Let me go backstage!
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: I'm afraid... it's too late now.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, good evening to you all.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: A warm welcome to everyone gathered here on this beautiful night to participate in our Spring Pop Fashion Show.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Without further ado, I will now hand the opening over to our emerging designers. These young artisans are the future of design, and their works will surely shine brightly on-stage.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: First up are the brand new creations of Miss Ye Zizhen.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Haha. It seems like Miss Ye here is a little shy, but truth be told, she has dedicated her all for this show. Why, just before I came on stage her assistant even handed me a special introduction to read.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: 'Inspired by the primitive jungles of Sargon, the power of life lies within the rugged rawness of nature, incorporated into a unique urban aesthetic to create an original style.'
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Please enjoy the newest release from the 'Wild Jungle' series.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: The brilliant lights seem to drip down onto the rough and wild patterns, like gold seeping from the remote wilderness into modern civilization.
The models carry on with their rehearsed poses, the contrasting juxtaposition of their shockingly exaggerated accessories and their outfits exuding an intense glamor.
Sir! Please wait! This is a mistake!
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Stop! Stop the showcase!
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: It's so over...
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: Ye... Miss Ye.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: Is this really your work?
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: No, it's not... I mean, yes, but it's an old collection I'd already abandoned! I didn't intend to showcase these!
attributes.name: Ye Zizhen

attributes.content: It's so... exquisite! Brimming with the vitality of nature!
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: Primitivity and modernity, nature and civilization. Who knew they could harmonize so wonderfully in these designs?
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: The purest form of beauty—like how a child would look at things. Something I've been painstakingly searching for... you've actually given it form.
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: Miss Ye Zizhen! You've done some outstanding work here!
attributes.name: Blanche

attributes.content: His voice is far from loud, but everyone present is sure they could clearly hear the famous designer's evaluation.
Then, applause erupts from all over the venue, finally forming a sea of congratulations.
Ye Zizhen sits back in her chair, unable to utter a word amidst the clamor and cheers.
Utage! So here's where you were, I've been looking for ya.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Evening.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Whoa! Got yer nails done again?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Isn't it pretty? I went with a darkcore look this time.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Ah, almost forgot why I was lookin' for ya. Y'know that 'Wild Jungle' series that's been all the rage in Lungmen these days?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh yeah?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: What, ya don't? It got real popular after some show, and now we got brands everywhere in Lungmen makin' clothes and accessories in that fashion!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So, I wanted to ask yer opinion, seeing how yer the famous 'Pink Katana' and all... Hey!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That pendant ya got on! It's from that 'Wild Jungle' series, right?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: How do I put it? The line has an interesting concept, but the designer herself is a little boring. Basically, I'd only recommend buying one or two pieces from the collection.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But the sudden rise in popularity... tsk, tsk. Maybe just a coincidence?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Phew. I can relax now that I've gotten a positive review from ya.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Right, I hear the shop behind this line is offerin' a sale recently, twenty percent off! Interested?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That so? Then—
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Time for another shopping trip.
attributes.name: Utage
